Package Delivery

Class Manifest

  • java.lang.Object
    • Delivery.Manifest

  • public class Manifest
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of trucks. Can be constructed manually or automaticall from a CSV file or an instance of Store.Store. Manifests have the ability to calculate their cost.
    Author:
    Chris

        public Manifest​(Store store)
         throws DeliveryException

      • Manifest

        public Manifest​(java.lang.String path)
         throws java.io.IOException,
                CSVFormatException,
                StockException,
                DeliveryException
        Constructor. Construct a new Manifest object from the data contained in the file specified. the CSV must be in the following form: >[truck type] [item],[quantity] [item],[quantity] >[truck type] [item],[quantity]
        Parameters:
        path - path to a file containing manifest data.
        Throws:
        StockException
        DeliveryException
        java.io.IOException
